content.rendered:
What is Stellar (XLM)?

Stellar is a decentralized protocol for financial transactions, based on the XRP open code base with its unique native asset called Lumens (XLM). Stellar can be used to send money anywhere in the world between any currency pairs (using Stellar Anchors). For example, the protocol supports sending money in dollars and receiving in euros. Stellar aims to bridge the gap between cryptos and fiat money, making it easy to transfer money between them. In essence, this is a distributed global currency exchange.

Stellar Price Prediction

Most experts agree that while the crypto market is in decline, the price of the XLM coin will drift at about the same level — $ 0,08—0,10. And only for 2019, it is predicted that the popularity will rise and also XLM will receive the status of one of the most demanded cryptos for daily payments.

Stellar Price News

2/15/2019 — Coinsquare, Canadian cryptocurrency exchange announced that they will use StellarX technology for decentralized zero-fee exchange.

Stellar (XLM) Market Prediction

#1 Smartereum XLM Price Prediction
Smartereum predicts the Stellar price in 2019 to be between $0.17 — $1.

#2 Wallet Investor XLM Price Prediction
According to the Wallet Investor prediction based on the machine learning and AI Stellar price will reach $0.124 rate by the end of 2019.

#3 Long Forecast XLM Price Prediction
By the end of 2019 XLM price will reach $0.30.

#3 Theoofy.com XLM Price Prediction
In 2019 XLM price will be something between $0.22 — $0.28.

Stellar Price Prediction

Stellar is one of the leading currencies on the market. Despite the fact of the bearish market and all the difficulties that all cryptocurrencies are facing, Stellar still may rise in the Q3 of 2019 hitting the $0.3 — $0.4 mark. Mass adoption of the Stellar ledger (contracts with IBM, Deloitte and also some partnership with different exchanges) may make Stellar one of the top cryptocurrencies in 2019.

Stellar Price Prediction

Stellar is partnered with such projects as SatoshiPay, Hashcash and Mobius and with many banking institutions. We believe that Stellar Lumens price may easily reach $0.6 by 2020.

How to buy Stellar?

You can easily buy Ripple via Atomic Wallet Interface and process a payment with your bank card. Then exchange Ripple to Stellar via built-in instant exchange.

Features:

  • Reasonable fees;
  • Fast and secure;
  • All in one interface;
  • Purchase Bitcoin all around the world;
  • Debit and credit cards accepted (VISA, Master Card);

How to exchange Stellar (XLM)?

Atomic Wallet allows you to exchange cryptocurrency using a built-in instant exchange between more than 60 assets at the best available rate via Changelly, ChangeNOW or Shapeshift.
